Yes I have the i3 cpu-2310M, 2.10Ghz 796MHz, 4Gb Ram, the issue is that there is a graphic in the motherboard & the graphic outside the HD radeon 6470M 1gb.
I have made it work from help from Drivers Solution but not 100% & I have disabled the other driver graphic in system because the bios does not show any graphic at all.

Found your product right now.Well it appears this one is sold on freedos bsd...
thereby i guess you decided to switch to xp and anyway without complete xp driver support,true ?
your model is approximally near of mine.
In fact you have two gpu !
first one is directly implemented in the heart of your cpu icore3.(Intel HD graphic gpu)Your second cpu is the HD6470M,and like mine,you cannot disable one of them by the bios directly.It is only possible directly by the ATI ccc setting option,where effectively you can chose to switch to the first or second one.There is no support for XP driver like mine for your model but i know how too proceed anyway.The problem is to find a near model with approximally same devices with xp driver support.
That's the same job i have to do for my HP model if i want to install an XP partition,and this is the case.
